bio: I am passionate about transforming our world through sustainable development of appropriate technologies. My work has been driven by the belief that there is more than enough opportunity in the world for us to use our talents, knowledge, and technology to contribute positively to our environment

We must take decisive action to avoid dangerous global warming . We cannot afford to wait any longer. I have a background in military aviation and I believe the air force is on the right track to achieve its mission of space dominance. We can take bold action to protect the planet from global warming by promoting spacefaring technology.

I am working on a project to transform our food production to be more sustainable. It involves using renewable energy, using sustainable technologies, and reducing waste. We are also looking into ways to use more natural materials in our foods.
With over 20 years of experience in the security industry, I believe that privacy is an essential and valuable human right that should be cherished and protected.

I have worked with wild animals in all sorts of environments, from deserts to rainforests, from the Himalayas to the Amazon. The world faces great challenges for wildlife conservation , and I have had the opportunity to work on many of them. We must protect not only the endangered animals but also all their habitats and all the ecosystems that they inhabit . I see my role as an advisor and facilitator to the many different countries and organisations working to ensure these challenges for the wildlife are addressed . In this capacity I have written a book entitled Wildlife on a Fast Track: Reducing the Impact. It is aimed at helping countries develop a conservation strategy which will lead to a sustainable future.
